columns.name: app_id
columns.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amplify app.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name for the Amplify app.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description for the Amplify app.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: Creates a date and time for the Amplify app.

columns.name: update_time
columns.description: Updates the date and time for the Amplify app.

columns.name: basic_auth_credentials
columns.description: The basic authorization credentials for branches for the Amplify app. You must base64-encode the authorization credentials and provide them in the format user:password.

columns.name: custom_headers
columns.description: Describes the custom HTTP headers for the Amplify app.

columns.name: default_domain
columns.description: The default domain for the Amplify app.

columns.name: enable_auto_branch_creation
columns.description: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify app.

columns.name: enable_basic_auth
columns.description: Enables basic authorization for the Amplify app's branches.

columns.name: enable_branch_auto_build
columns.description: Enables the auto-building of branches for the Amplify app.

columns.name: enable_branch_auto_deletion
columns.description: Automatically disconnect a branch in the Amplify Console when you delete a branch from your Git repository.

columns.name: iam_service_role_arn
columns.description: The AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) service role for the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amplify app.

columns.name: platform
columns.description: The platform for the Amplify app.

columns.name: repository
columns.description: The Git repository for the Amplify app.

columns.name: repository_clone_method
columns.description: The Amplify service uses this parameter to specify the authentication protocol to use to access the Git repository for an Amplify app. Amplify specifies TOKEN for a GitHub repository, SIGV4 for an AWS CodeCommit repository, and SSH for GitLab and Bitbucket repositories.

columns.name: auto_branch_creation_config
columns.description: Describes the automated branch creation configuration for the Amplify app.

columns.name: auto_branch_creation_patterns
columns.description: Describes the automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify app.

columns.name: build_spec
columns.description: Describes the content of the build specification (build spec) for the Amplify app.

columns.name: custom_rules
columns.description: Describes the custom redirect and rewrite rules for the Amplify app.

columns.name: environment_variables
columns.description: The environment variables for the Amplify app.

columns.name: production_branch
columns.description: Describes the information about a production branch of the Amplify app.
